CONTRACT_ID: Yeah, it's a 3D scanner. Specifically, it's a 3D scanner for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) in Newfoundland and Labrador (NL). The contract period is expected to commence on December 15, 2023, and end on March 31, 2025.  The mandatory technical criteria for this contract have been made clear in the request for proposals.
short_summary: This contract is for the supply of one (1) 3D scanner for the RCMP in NL.
description: Request for proposals for a 3D scanner; contact Rosalee Parsons at rpcmps@rcmp-grc.gc.ca for more information.
duration_in_months: I'm not part of the procurement process, but I believe the duration of this contract is roughly 27 months if it starts in December 2023 and ends in March 2025.
full_summary:
**Title**
3D Scanner for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police in Newfoundland and Labrador

**Reference**
cb-730-63313335

**Solicitation Details**
* Solicitation Number: M1000-4-02550B
* Publication Date: December 29, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: January 22, 2024, at 13:00:00

**Contract Details**
* Expected Contract Start Date: January 18, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024
* Contract Period: From the date of award to March 31, 2025

**Procurement Method**
* Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

**Goods and Services**
* The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires the supply of one (1) 3D scanner to be delivered to St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador
* All goods and initial training must be received on or before March 31, 2024
* Optional second training session must be delivered on or before March 31, 2025

** Tender Submission Instructions**
* Tenders must be submitted by email to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at ATL_Procurement@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
* Refer to the attached tender documents for further information

**Additional Requirements**
* Indigenous Procurement: The Canadian government encourages opportunities for Indigenous businesses
* Integrity Regime: The Government of Canada has adopted the Integrity Regime

**Contact Information**
* Rosalee Parsons
* Email: rosalee.parsons@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
* Phone: 902-720-5112

Here are the attachments for tenders:
 * https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28469/english-solicitation-m1000402550b.pdf
 * https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28469/amendment-002-to-solicitation-m1000402550b.pdf
 * https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28469/amendment-001-english-solicitation-m1000402550b.pdf
 * https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28469/modification-001-francais-solicitation-m1000402550b.pdf
 * https://canadabuys.can
